biotools.summary: This resource hosts Brassica genome databases. B. rapa genome browser: including comprehensive annotation of the repeat fraction of the genome using the genome viewer GBrowse2. B. oleracea pan genome browser: including SNPs and functional annotation of genes. BlastGbrowse: A portal for blasting a query sequence to B. rapa and B. oleracea pan genome and allow conveniently link hits to the above Genome Browsers.
